website_summaries.verdict: Great value for an efficient trimmer. Cuts close to the skin instead of leaving excess hair. Easy to clean and water resistant. Runs efficiently on one AA battery.
pros: We love the small and lightweight design
Easy to clean, just immerse the head in water and hit the power
Quiet motor and comfortable to use with ergonomic angled body
cons: Some users received faulty units that didn't work right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Product will last several years
customer_reviews.text: this product is easy to use and will last several years unless you drop it. I have ordered this model at least 3 times and am very satisfied with it for ear and mustache hair removal
customer_reviews.author: RX Bill

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: He uses it to eliminate the pesky ear hairs. It’s easy to use and does the job quickly and painlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Livie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not much more to say. It does a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: PDGood

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer cuts hairs close. Others I have tried (and returned) left the hairs about 1/8".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Nose/Ear Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice nose trimmer by Panasonic. I recommend this purchase. Very quiet operation and does trim nose and ear hair growth very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Super product it is a great tool and well constructed
customer_reviews.author: John S Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Too much price just for simple machine without accessories
customer_reviews.text: No battery inside and it’s difficult to find right battery for it
customer_reviews.author: Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. This is a good
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Carson

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few of these over the years and the Panasonic has always worked the best.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for nose and ear hairs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The last one worked for over 5 years. It cuts hairs very short, unlike another brand that I tried. Also very easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James C Ward

customer_reviews.title: The Best Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's favorite trimmer. He say it's the best one he has found.
customer_reviews.author: jendog

customer_reviews.title: bad design, manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer worked a couple of times erratically, and finally quit working altogether. I think it is poorly engineered or poorly manufactured electric circuitry, probably the switch. Spend the bucks, get a good one. for the same amount of money there are far better products. Panasonic used to be a trusted name, now they sell junk, like so many other made in china products. i would rate it 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine Until You Open It
customer_reviews.text: I went through two of these, both times I when I opened the top to clean it after using it for a while the blades fell out of the unit, into my sink and bent - they never worked the same after this. They do not sell replacement heads so you have to keep buying a new one. Works fine until you need to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Battery outlasted the trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for very occasional use - until it simply stopped working (fresh batteries did not make a difference.)
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: TH
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked. After 2 months it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Mis

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Got as a gift and have to turn the battery to the right spot for it to come on. Pain just to trim and move the battery every second. Company won’t even work with me for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good but weak and does not last long
customer_reviews.text: This product should have performed better than it did. The motor was weak compared to the product I replaced it with. It lasted barely two years before it stopped working altogether. I'd shop for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Levin

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine until it didn't: gave out before the first battery did.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I got 2 and both crapped out a couple months after having it
customer_reviews.author: Murph

product_meta.title: Panasonic ER-GN30-K MENS NOSE EAR HAIR TRIMMER WI, 7.00in. x 4.25in. x 2.25in
product_meta.description:
FEATURES:

 * Wet/Dry
 * Hypo-Allergenic Stainless-Steel Blades
 * 100% Washable
 * Vortex Cleaning System
 * Cleaning Brush
 * Battery Operated
 * 90 Minute Operating Time
 * Protective Cap
feature_bullets: This is an O.E.M. Authorized part
Fits with various Panasonic brand models
